ComicInfo.Title: Part 1: There is Only Ever Blood
ComicInfo.Summary:
Overview
The #0 features an original story that leads directly into the full-size monthly series that starts in August priced at just $2.99 per issue!
When the political situation in the USA becomes more than Horus can stand, he moves to take matters into his own hands. But since not all his other team-mates aren’t so eager to throw the world into chaos, an epic conflict starts to form.
And no one will be safe as the bodies start to fall.
